description: portrait of an elderly man with long white beard wearing billed cap
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Label and Sticker

LRC, in pencil: [149]; on verso at top, in pencil: [CLASS A. / PORTRAIT / ARTHUR M. TOMLINSON / 110 S. DEARBORN ST / CHICAGO, ILL] and [43AD]
markings: on back: label from Marshall Field 1936 Annual Photo Competition; on back: sticker from Clinton Camera Club
signed: on mount below image, in pencil: [PORTRAIT ARTHUR M. TOMLINSON]
title: Portrait
